attributes.action: work along side the policw force to help combat and prevent disability hate crime across the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to the recent number of cases on the news referring to disability hste crime and the lack of work done by the police to follow up reports of abuse by/of disabled people, this petition has been set up in order to make the police take note and recognise disabled hate crime and start to act upon the reports they recieve.
